website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality mattress is a terrific option for kids and adults alike.
pros: Plush mattress may make you feel like you are sleeping on a cloud
Features both Viscolatex Responsive foam and high-density foam to ensure you are fully supported while you sleep
Offered in a variety of sizes
cons: Mattress tends to sag, even after limited use
May be too firm for some users

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: After being left to "inflate" for 4 days now the mattress will not fully expand. You can still clearly see where it was folded into the box. I have the green tea model from them in my guest room and it is great, will be returning this one for a second green tea model.
customer_reviews.author: NickH

customer_reviews.title: 6 month review
customer_reviews.text: 6 month update. After sleeping on the mattress 3 months it started to sag, we rotated it to fix the problem. The problem has only gotten worse, now my wife 150 pounds and I 220 pounds each sleep in our own divots in the bed and we both wake with a backache most days. Today I woke with shooting pains due to the poor support. For the price I didn't expect it to last 10 years, but six months is ridiculous. I wish more people would post longer term reviews than these reviews immediately after purchase, they are really misleading. Will be ordering another mattress.
customer_reviews.author: K. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, surprising great night sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I had very low expectations on this. I just wanted something cheap. Didn't actually think I'd be getting a good night sleep as well. I have a horribly bad back, doesn't cure my back pain but I can actually sleep through the night without waking up in pain. Actually a really good bed, incredible value!
customer_reviews.author: Bowhunt3r4l1f3

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this mattress under any circumstances. After a few months of use, I developed irritation on my eyelids and around the eye area, a scratchy throat, and itchy skin. I just recently discovered that Zinus uses fiberglass in their mattresses and is the subject of multiple lawsuits as a result of the material causing users extreme physical discomfort and adverse health effects. I did not remove the mattress cover or tamper with the material in any way, and yet the fiberglass was able to permeate through. I am now very concerned for my health and am looking for an alternative mattress. I repeat, do not buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't have a clue how to describe this.  Firm/hard?  YES!  Soft?  YES!  Strangest thing ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, an update after having this bed for over 2 wks. I just can't sleep on it. I don't know how some nights it feels too soft; like I'm sinking in it, and other nights it feels hard as a rock. So strange. The mattress is beautiful and seems to be of good quality. Just need something inbetween hard and soft. This isn't it. I'm going to try a hybrid mattress next.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Chia

customer_reviews.title: Take these reviews as warnings!
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews - the mold, the smells, etc. but I figured there were enough decent ones that the odds were in my favor. Bought this mattress for my daughter. The top and bottom (head and foot area) never fully fluffed up. And the smell. Ughhh it’s an AWFUL musty mixed with chemical type smell. Her entire room smells. Stuffed animals on top of the sheets, blankets, etc. We have another brand mattress on the way and I’m just hoping the smell comes out of the things we plan to keep. *i will add that amazon customer service was amazing about this. Gave us a full refund and advised us to dispose of the mattress (gladly!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft for my taste -
customer_reviews.text: Way too soft for my taste - when you sit on the edge it doesn't support your weight like other mattresses I've used in the past. I personally prefer a firmer mattress also it doesn't help with my lower back issues. If you are looking for a very soft and not firm mattress then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tito S.

customer_reviews.title: Get this Bed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since setting this bed a few days ago, my husband has finally sept through the night. He no longer tosses and turns. I love it too. It's like sleeping on a cloud. It's soft but firm. Pure perfection. I was afraid it would smell and give me a headache. I have a very strong sense of smell and this bed had zero smell. It fluffed up within the first thirty minutes to its full height. If you're worried about buying one of these mattresses, worry no more. Buy it and you won't regret it because, we don't!
customer_reviews.author: EConnorTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought some crazy expensive beds before and this one is the best! I'm recommending it to everyone! We are skinny people and this gives us some cushion better than the other memory foams that are so stiff. Side note I have spondylitis (spine arthritis) and this bed is perfect for my pain!
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this purchase. I do not recommend this purchase for a main bedroom. I got it to place our spare bedroom but switched it to my bedroom. Within two months it had dips in it where my husband and I both slept. Within six months we had to replace it. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: Tears in mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bed is great. Everything we expected except the holes and tears that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Suzann

customer_reviews.title: Good: Its pretty firm and relaxing to body
customer_reviews.text: Good: Its pretty firm and relaxing to body. Cons: The right firmness is the only good part. It has the smell of some petroleum-like products which is very strong and hasn't gone since 1 month I have been using. I weigh less than 120 lb and it has already started to shrink around where I sleep. and losing its shape and firmness. I am already thinking of returning it, but the challenge is it comes vacuum packed (like most mattresses do) and once it expands won't fit in the original packing. I ordered the plastic cover for it to return but UPS won't pick it since this is not secure packed.
customer_reviews.author: shoppe

customer_reviews.title: Super firm. Not plush at all
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying not to admit to myself how uncomfortable this mattress is to me. It’s way too firm. Not plush as is advertised. I was so excited to have bought my very own bed for the first time so I’ve really wanted to love it but it’s caused back pain and body stiffness that lasts all day. However, my 24 yr old son came over and laid down on it and loves it. But he prefers a firm mattress. I have to keep it so I’m working on finding a foam mattress topper to bring softness and relieve pressure points. However I wasn’t planning on the extra expense, so I’m pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent manufacturing?!?!
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research before purchasing this mattress. I finally chose it over others because of the consistent testimony to it's soft, plush feel. After reading all the glowing reviews, I was so excited for it to finally arrive. I am sad to say my experience has not been as the other buyers. I find this mattress to be so firm that my hips hurt after a few hours sleeping on it. I am a side sleeper and I am never able to get comfortable on this mattress. It's so uncomfortable for me that I actually went back to using my old memory foam mattress that I bought from Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Z

customer_reviews.title: Literally amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best. Purchase. Ever. Embarrassingly enough I’d say I spend 75% of the time I’m at home in my bed, so I figured it was long overdue for a mattress upgrade and, oh, it was. I went from a Sealy full spring mattress as old as I am to this Zinus queen. So far I love this mattress and have been raving about it to pretty much everyone including strangers on the internet. It’s firm enough to provide support but soft enough to get comfortable very easily. Added bonus: there’s also absolutely no squeaking or creaking during bed olympics.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these mattresses because they're so great! Anytime a friend is looking for a mattress suggestion or considering one of the other mattress in a box companies, I always shoot them this link. You will not find a better quality mattress for this price. The mattress is pretty firm (what I needed for a bad back) and I do prefer a little bit of softness, but I got a nice pillow top mattress topper with the money I saved and it made it perfect - even with that I still saved hundreds compared to what this setup would have cost me anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: make sure you get what you pay for inches wise
customer_reviews.text: I don't have pain do I can't comment in that box. Came quickly and this is the second time I ordered from the company. And it's the second time I ordered an 8 inch and it only rose to 6 inches! There is a difference in price. The first time I figured I slept on the mattress to soon and chalked it up to my error. But this time I waited longer than the time period and it still didn't rise to 8 inches. My bed frame is low so inches do matter. Too bad because it is comfortable and arrives on time. But I won't order again. I feel ripped off. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Alletto MSW USC

customer_reviews.title: Plush, super comfortable, very sturdy but enough about me. Don’t miss this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I doubt the founding fathers ever slept in something this comfortable, but neither did my Grandma. The 12 inch is more than enough to accommodate even the most picky of mattress pickers. It’s very even upon opening and perfectly bound on all sides so as not to slump in or warp over time. If anyone’s been complaining in the posts, I’d guess it’s mostly problems with foundation upon which the mattress lays, rather than the mattress itself. Lastly, if you still want something extra to feel like a Disney Princess, add a nice mattress topper and boom, it’s like you win a lottery to heaven every night. Highly recommend this mattress to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ace_Denver

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: My mattress arrived on time. I immediately opened the box and closely followed the instructions As per the manufacturer. I waited 72 hours and the mattress was no where near decompressed. I attempted to sleep on it hoping that would help but, the mattress never completely decompressed. The corners are about 4” and curled. The sides are rolled down all along all edges. I reached out to the manufacturer and they were extremely unhelpful. They offered no assistance. Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia A. Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a queen size a couple of years ago and very happy with that mattress so anticipated having the same experience with this king! It arrived quickly. Got it unwrapped and on the base and waited for it to expand! This is a 12 inch mattress. It expanded to 10 inches on one side and 9 on the other. There’s a big roll of material across the foot of the mattress. Contacted Zinus customer support! Sent lots of photos and screen shot to prove I purchased the mattress and showing the discrepancies! All of that was provided 2 weeks ago! Never heard anything back! Won’t be purchasing another Zinus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a sleep number bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sleep number bed I paid over $4,000 for. I always thought I would buy a sleep number again when needed. I purchased this bed for my 4 year old. Sometimes I end up in her bed and wanted something bigger than a twin. I can honestly say I would prefer to sleep in her bed. I wake up with significantly less pain when I sleep with her. I find myself staying in her bed more often. Not too soft, not too hard. It really is just right. And for the price??? Can. Not. Beat. This. Bed. Also, I am a larger woman. I don't feel like it dips at all. Great support all over. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wintjen

customer_reviews.title: Truly is not worth the money you’ll save. Buy something better.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for exactly 6 months. The first 3 months were amazing. The bed moved around you so you were fully supported while you slept. It kept us the perfect temperature all through the night. Now it’s like sleeping on a rock. I think I’d be better off sleeping on the floor. We’re back to sleeping in our guest room on a hand-me-down Queen mattress. I’m furious. We expected to get at least a couple of years out of it. Also to whom it may concern: my husband and I are very small people, both under 130 pounds. There’s absolutely no reason for the sudden decompression of the top layer of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Firm
customer_reviews.text: We got this mattress because it was supposed to be plush/soft. I expected to sink into it a little like our last gel memory foam mattress. My husband and I didn’t like it right away but wanted to give it some time. It’s been over 3 months now. It’s hasn’t softened up at all. We regret buying this and wish we would have tried to return it earlier. I feel like I could have spent less and gotten a better mattress. I would not recommend this mattress to anyone, unless you also enjoy sleeping on the floor, then this one might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe’s Wife

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years, I still love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I haven't had any of the issues I've seen in bad reviews. After opening it up and letting it air out for 24 hours, it had no smell, and it's shape was perfect and as described. I the kind of person that gets hot from it though, but that is what is to be expected from memory foam, and I knew that before buying it. If you can't stand the heat, don't get memory foam, it's that simple. Can't knock the company for what is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tub

customer_reviews.title: I've never slept better!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awesome!!! It was super easy to unbox, was pretty much full size within 24 hours but we waited the extra days just in case, and I've never been happier. I don't understand how this is so inexpensive! It's just hard enough you're not completely sinking into the thing but it's soft enough that it does cradle you just right. I've had sleep issues forever now and having this mattress has been a lifesaver. Great, great mattress!!
customer_reviews.author: kaffinated

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm/Hard!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the review of how plush yet supportive this mattress was, I was excited to get it. However, it it really hard and not too comfortable at all. I have bursitis in my hips and was hoping this would help but unfortunately, it hasn't helped at all. It is really hard and I still toss and turn all nite trying to get comfortable. No smell as others have mentioned tho! Overall really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SAG

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in December of 2018 for our Air BnB. It has held up well... different folks of different weights and expectations have all said they slept well on this mattress. I came back to buy one for our home bed... and now the price is $100 higher! I'll wait till cyber Monday and see if i can catch it on sale. The times I have slept on this matteress I have slept well, through the night, and woke up refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good bed but not as good as previously purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these beds over the years and they all decompressed fully except the for the 12" queen size I just purchased. It is only measuring about 10-11" and is not nearly as comfortable as a fully decompressed one previously purchased. From what I understand from Zenus I would have to return the mattress to Amazon to get a refund or a replacement. Not sure how that works once the mattress is decompressed....
customer_reviews.author: M. Boerner

customer_reviews.title: Love it but needs to have quality control. Not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I had one in twin a while back and I loved it for years. Now that I just moved I thought it’s a good time to upgrade to a larger so I bought this. It’s still the same feel, giving me a good night’s sleep. However, this one that I got is a bit disappointed in that it didn’t fully inflate to 12”, which is what I paid for. It’s more like a 10”, and that the topper that it came with somehow is shifted and not adhere to it like I can see it positioned on the side.
customer_reviews.author: ocannie2002

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell that won't go away!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress open for three days, and it is still off-gassing so badly that I taste it in the back of my throat every time I go upstairs. I opened this on Saturday morning, and it stank immediately. I even opened the window in the middle of January on a 34 degree day to air it out. No luck - it is not Monday night and it still stinks so badly that it gives me a headache to be in the same room. I don't know what to do with it at this point. It's disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Two

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to melt all your body ache away!! 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Great price, arrived on time, and it’s the most comfortable mattress I have ever owned. If you want your body to melt right into your bed(literally) I recommend you buy this mattress. My main focus was to find a great mattress for a reasonable price and one that could also help with pain relief but also gives great comfort for falling asleep because I have a hard time falling asleep and staying asleep; let me tell you 😲 I truly got my money worth with this purchase. Now I’m sleeping better then ever before. 😴 I’m totally in love with ZINUS products now And they also gives you little gift cards in your packages. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Demetria

customer_reviews.title: Great even 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2017 I love it. Still very comfy, it has a little indent from the spot I have slept in for 3 years ( to be expected) but it’s still great! It’s affordable and I still love it after 3 years. Do I think it’ll last 10 years- nope... but neither do the super expensive ones. At least at this price I feel like I’m getting great bang for my buck ( no more back aches) and when I have to replace it ... it won’t feel terrible bc it’s affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very excited with the look & seeming quality of this mattress, but it fell very short of the description quickly. After 90+ hours of decompressing we still had a pucker & 2"-3" less of height than was promised. The mattress felt hard & unyielding, very uncomfortable to us. Would I buy it again? No. I got a refund from Amazon who handled the problem expertly & professionally. If I had the money & could do it over again, I would choose another high quality pillow top mattress that gives support & feels good to lay on immediately. The whole process of leaving it for days to decompress & air out is a pain!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not so Plush
customer_reviews.text: Be weary, although perfect quality, after receiving this, and after the recommended time to decompress, it still felt a little firmer than I expected. It is called an "Ultra Plush" mattress but somehow has been given a "firm" rating compared to the other Zinus mattresses which are indeed given firmness ratings. Check the whole page and make sure you compare appropriately!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Levine

customer_reviews.title: Look for a better option, there are a lot of mattress choices available.
customer_reviews.text: The item is just okay, I recommend looking for another option. The mattress only expanded to about 9.25 inches and that is in the middle the sides are about 8.75 inches. It may expand more but I doubt it because it is well over a week. It is softer than my old Olee mattress but not by much, the Olee mattress is a better buy than the Zinus 10 inch cloud memory foam mattress. For the money I pain 215.00 it is worth keeping for a year or so it would be a pain to return.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer - Buying a second one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress in August of 2017 for my son to use while he as at college. He absolutely loves it. He's a big kid, too - well over 200 lbs. He says this is the most comfortable bed he's ever slept on including the expensive pillow-top mattress that's in his room at home. My daughter is now off to college, so I'm buying the same one for her. Also, I paired this mattress with this platform bed frame sold via Amazon: FURINNO FB002F Angeland Mattress Foundation Platform Metal Bed Frame, Full. Sold by: LLYtech. I'm wondering if the frame makes a difference with the mattress's comfort.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveLamp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable even for a side sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Had a very old metal spring mattress and was overdue for something new. I was a bit nervous seeing a lot of reviews calling this mattress "firm" as I like a softer mattress being a side sleeper. A friend of mine also has this mattress and reassured me that he and his wife like it. Took a chance and am very happy with it. Have been sleeping on this mattress for almost 5 months now and sleep much better than on the old mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: A little too soft
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress for our guest room. I have not spent a whole night sleeping on it so I can't really say honestly how it is. However, just laying on it I felt it was too soft for me. I really like a firm mattress and the 12 inch Zinus Green Tea memory foam is perfect. I purchased these 2 mattresses at the same time and have the Green Tea memory foam in our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: trekker46

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT NOW !
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best thing I ever bought my back aches are gone and I can even sleep on my side and I don't wake up hurting now I want to buy the matching pillows. surprised how small they got it and it turned it's full 12 inches in minutes !! Even tho the instructions said it would take 24hrs to 48 hrs my dog Luna also approves I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 months in and still love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in January. And I held off my review until July so I could test it out and make sure it didnt change as time passed. This mattress was life changing. I read many reviews and held off before purchasing but went with the 12 inch full size mattress and it took about 2 days to inflate. The comfort level is insane. As soon as you lay down it is like you are on a cloud! Anyone that has sat on my bed mentions how amazing it feels. I don't see any crates forming or sagging of any kind. It was my first memory foam mattress and I am very satisfied with the way it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying a mattress without trying it out first, but the price, reviews and return policy convinced me. Sleeps warmer than I thought. For the first time in years, I'm able to sleep on my back. I'm a side sleeper, but have a shoulder injury that sometimes makes side sleeping uncomfortable. I used a slatted bed frame and wasn't sure about putting the mattress on it without some kind of support, so I used the boxes that the bed and frame came in. Because my bedroom is small, I sit on the bed and have found that I have to sit way back or feel like I'm sliding off the edge. It's a good mattress otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Defective despite following instructions. Save yourself the frustration.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for over 2 weeks trying to decide between buying from Lucid or Zinus. Based on Amazon bestseller recommendation and reviews, I thought this would be a great mattress for my 1st apartment. I WAS SO WRONG. I ordered the 10” and the measurements it grew to (AFTER 72 HOURS OF WAITING) are: Corners: 4.5” Short sides: 5.5”-6” Long sides: 7.5”-8” In other words, NO PART OF THIS MATTRESS IS 10 INCHES. I’m VERY disappointed and will be contacting Amazon & Zinus for replacement/refund. The product is defective if you follow ALL of the instructions and it still doesn’t work! Should’ve ordered Lucid or went with an expensive brand and saved myself the frustration
customer_reviews.author: Monique Billups

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, exceptional price.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I wasn’t expecting much at this price point. I was hugely surprised. We bought this bed for my daughter’s first college apartment, not wanting to break the bank for something potentially temporary. We both slept on it (probably around 300lbs total give or take 20-50 lbs) and we were both surprised at how comfortable the mattress was. It was like a cloud. I recently bought a bed that retails around $2k and is in 5 star hotels. I have to say that this mattress was comparable to my more expensive mattress. I highly recommend, at least for a temporary solution. My kid has been using it for two months now and has no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: XReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Move on to another brand....
customer_reviews.text: After much time the corners have never expanded. This 8 inch foam mattress at best is 5 inches in the middle. Different manufacturer, my first foam queen mattress was to hard but lighter in weight. This Zinus full size is heavy and no better than sleeping on a large pillow. I can't even fathom how to ship it back. Would not purchase another Zinus.
customer_reviews.author: karissa cambron

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice but after three weeks still smells of chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: So it's a nice mattress from a feel perspective. Very comfortable. But we've had it for a month and you can still smell the chemicals in it. No idea what's going on. And it's very noticeable...it's not faint. You can smell it in the room...you don't even have to be close to it. We aired it out for five days before sleeping on it. Now, about three weeks later, it still smells. Zinus -- any ideas? What is happening? Anyone else have this issue???
customer_reviews.author: Superfluouschap

customer_reviews.title: MOST AMAZING MATTRESS EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away at the quality of this mattress!!! I couldn't afford a Casper mattress, so when I found this Zinus mattress and how similar it was made, for a 1/4 of the price, I had to try it. It is the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in!!! It supports me, yet it is soft like a cloud! It was a little scary ordering a mattress online without being able to try it out first, but it was worth the risk and I'm so happy I did! I've told several people about this mattress and they are going to buy it too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT Ultra Plush- it is FIRM
customer_reviews.text: One of the main reasons we chose this mattress was that it was described as "Ultra Plush". Not true. This is definitely a FIRM mattress. Not Medium, not Plush, and most definitely not Ultra Plush- it is Firm. I bought it for my daughter, and she has added a mattress pad which helps a bit. She may need to buy a mattress topper. I now see many other reviews that say this mattress is firm- so why doesn't Zinus change the description of this mattress? It is misleading. I gave it 3 stars because the mattress looks nice and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for almost 4 years. Initially it took forever (4 days or so) to fully decompress. It was very firm which I was happy with. Unfortunately that firmness wore out quickly. Within 6 months I found myself sleeping on the sofa once or twice a week because my back needed a break from the sagging center of the bed. I rotated it every week with fresh linens but that didn't seem to help. After a year I put it in the spare room and ordered a regular Sealy inner spring mattress again and haven't looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Badoobie

customer_reviews.title: The 12” one is actually a 10”. Don’t pay the extra, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Considering the difference of $111 in price between the 10” mattress and the 12” one (which I purchased), I very much hoped that those 2 inches of inner memory foam layers would eventually show, after letting it rest for 33 hours. But as you can see that’s not the case. I did everything exactly as per instructions. It just reached it current thickness in minutes, literally, and then it stopped. I don’t feel like I should sleep another night on my couch in the hope that those 2 inches will magically show tomorrow afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: The gas this mattress gives of is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the same bed a year ago for my son & now it was time to upgrade to a 'big kid bed' for our daughter. We did the exact same process we did with the first bed, as in, letting it reform for 72 hours before use. But for some reason the smell of this bed is unreal! I am unsure what the 'gass off' period for this mattress will be since we are now on day 10 and it still unbearable! (Btw we have it in a room with an air purifier & fan running) I am not sure what the difference is between the first mattress we received and this one, but it's not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Juston

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is not ultra soft.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be ultra soft. Its not even close to even being 'kind of' soft. This is a very firm mattress for being memory foam. The quality (built) of it appears to be very nice, however. It was packaged well and was easy to open and it arrived sooner than promised. For those reasons I didnt give it a 1 star. Buyer beware. If you absolutely need an ultra soft mattress, you won't get it with this mattress. I regret not just going to my local mattress stores to personally try them out for softness. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Great for auto immune pain xo
customer_reviews.text: Holy Shnikey night one and I tell you, I’m in love. I’ll be back for updates but ten outa ten of you have joint paint do yourself a favor buy the 12 inch and love yourselffff Update: 3 months in. I LOVE THIS MF MATTRESS AND IF YOU LOVE YOU?!??? Get oneeeee get many. Buy them all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Addiedearest

customer_reviews.title: It's not a great mattress. Presses down to far (the manufacturer calls ...
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this. It's not a great mattress. Presses down to far (the manufacturer calls this settling) after a few months. It becomes very hard and difficult to sleep on. Makes it hard for aches and pains to go away compared to more expensive mattresses with layered better thought out technology. I'm really not happy with this purchase but after reading the manufacturers warranty they word it in such a way that "settling" is just normal and therefore your disappointment and poor product wear are disguised by these definitions. Bottom line. Look elsewhere. Maybe try a thicker one from Zinus. The 10 inch wasn't available when I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is amazing. My husband and I had a mattress that was really squishy but it didn’t relieve our pain, only made it worse. I was expecting the mattress to be just a tad bit softer, but either way I love it. A read a lot of comments of people saying theirs didn’t go up all the way or it had body indents after a while. I never had any of these problems. I would definitely buy again when this one is to warn out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylah

customer_reviews.title: supportive and soft, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this mattress. I called them to make sure this is the softest they make. I am so pleased to find out it is waaaay softer than another mattress I ordered from this company. There was almost no smell at all. I bought this as a second bed to keep at another house. I woke up this morning and for a second I thought I was at home in my very expensive tempurpedic bed. I would but this bed again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard as rocks
customer_reviews.text: Its like sleeping on a bed of rocks. The mattress didn't even inflate to the 10 inches it was supposed to. The pillow top is not soft enough or thick enough to counteract the hard layer underneath. I called Zenus to return it and they told me to check with Amazon since that is where I bought it from and it can be returned as long as it's in the return window per amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this mattress I sleep on my side and my partner sleeps on their back and we both have started to have back pain since purchasing this mattress and we’re only in our twenties. I looked at the reviews before purchasing and thought the positive reviews out weighed the negative but I was wrong.I’ve purchased other mattresses from Amazon and never had a bad purchase until now. Choose any other mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Bland

customer_reviews.title: Barely 7 inches, Flimsy, Can hardly use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 5 days now and it is barely 7 inches. When I lay down or sit on the mattress, the sides collapse and the plush top layer slides off the side of the bed partially, ruining the sheets. While this is a very comfortable mattress, this is my 5th bed in a box from Amazon and this is the only one I have ever purchased that did not come out right. I'm fairly certain that the foam should have rose more to pull the sides of the mattress taunt, but as you can see on the images they are loose and baggy
customer_reviews.author: Tech Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Junk mattress and Amazon is useless with returning it
customer_reviews.text: Received 1 and it never decompressed. Had it replaced and the second never got above 6.5 inches. 1st photo is after a week. Keep in mind the the top of the bed is only 3 inches from the week slats. Amazon expects the 1st to be returned but won’t tell me how beyond providing a UPS label. UPS WILL NOT ACCEPT IT without it being in a box. So now I am paying for 2 because amazon does not know what to do with bad mattresses. I don’t want it at my house and don’t want to be liable for it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lydon

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft. Melt right in.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because I'd had my original one for way longer than one should (I could feel the springs). I think this bed is pretty affordable and of great quality. I sleep well every night. Its super soft and body contouring. If you like more support then it may not be for you but I was worried it'd be too firm but it wasn't at all. I am a side/back sleeper and it worked splendidly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for a month. First memory foam mattress for us. Reviews we read were mainly positive but had it firm and soft. I guess it depends when it was made. This mattress is firm so we placed a 2" zinus gel foam topper. The two together has given us perfect night sleep. Best thing is neither of us wake up with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! The best sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mattress!! I haven’t slept this good in years! As someone with fibromyalgia who suffers from pain and insomnia this mattress has tremendously helped me get a good rested nights sleep. Highly recommend! I purchased the 10” and am completely satisfied. Thank you Zinus!
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the well off even.
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly surprised. No l, really. It came rolled up tight, but it decompresses to full size really fast. And it's comfortable. I was worried that it being cheap meant it would be very crappy. It isn't. Also, I deliver mail in a very affluent area. I'm talking million dollar homes with statute fountains in the front yard. Basically, homes I can't afford. I recall seeing a few Zinus boxes at more than a few stops when I delivered Amazon packages. So it seems like it's good enough for wealthy too, or at least their pets, lol. All in all, I'll be returning when I need a new mattress or accessories. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I switched from the Zinus Green Tea memory foam due to hip and shoulder pain from sleeping on my side. When I got the Cloud, I was skeptical because of the "perceived" firmness, but it has been a pleasant surprise....not all of the pain has been relieved, but enough that I don't wake up sore in the middle of the night....if I roll over once during the night it controls the pain enough that it's not a huge problem....probably the best I'll be able to do at age 63
customer_reviews.author: Roger Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Not expanded to 12" / Good producy,good quality , no oddors.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product,no odors, looks good , the only down side is that did not expanded to 12" it inly reached 10 1/2 " , I wanted to buy another one an 8" bit I am not sure , I will think about it, If I can get a 10" for the price of an 8" , that will work , at the end of the day I will have a 8 1/2 or 9 " matress .
customer_reviews.author: Grita

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but not too firm
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mattress that lives up to its claims except firmness. Easy to open, no offensive smell, attractive covering and self-inflated to appropriate size in less than a day. The problem I am having is that it is not as firm as I had hoped and therefore not that good for my pressure points (new hip replacement with ITB syndrome means I have a leg that can radiate some pain. It is fixable with PT). So it would have been better to be firmer but if you don't have this problem you will love it. Basically very comfortable for average person.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Chiachiaretto

customer_reviews.title: Personally need more cushion
customer_reviews.text: I am approx 118lbs and am a side/back sleeper. I thought the 8" would be sufficient but I need more cushion to fall into. Maybe the weight has something to do with it, thus the reason I provided the information. I like it a little firm thus my choice for going with the 8" but now that I've had it for a couple of weeks, I know. I think the quality is great for the price and the guarantee is competitive with Casper and T&N. That says a lot about a company. The mattress didn't take long to reach full thickness. I'm going to go to Lowe's and try out the 10" Tuft and Needle before I make another decision.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Horrible choice DO NOT BUY UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: ** GARBAGE UPDATE!!** I have been using the mattress and now the sides are bulging and collapsing. I'm only 115# getting in and out of it... ZERO response from manufacturer Ultra plush implies that it's soft. No. As a matter of fact, it's harder than the mattress I got rid of. And now I'm stuck and still not getting any sleep. I bought the 12" again under the presumption that it was softer than the 10". It hasn't expanded more than 10" anyway and is only 8" in the corners. (Today is Wednesday, received Saturday) AND IT STINKS. HORRIBLE! I come up the stairs from outside and the whole loft is stinking from the bed. Biggest mistake ever
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and so comfortable. I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the idea of a mattress coming in a box but I have been blown away by the comfort of this mattress. It’s soft but firm. You don’t sink in like a tempurpedic mattress. I prefer a more firm mattress and after over 6 months of use there still aren’t ware spots or any problems. Seeing as I paid over $2000 for my last queen size mattress this was a wonderful experience. I did not experience any smell or problems with it expanding. I’ve recommended this mattress to multiple friends and family members
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a mattress that would replace the one in our trailer. It came in a huge wrapped package. I followed the directions to unwrap and let inflate. This was definitely one of the best purchases we made. After a 3 week vacation sleeping on this mattress, I can honestly say this is amazing! Suffering from back and neck issues we needed to find a mattress that would allow for better pain free sleep and this is the answer. I looked at all the reviews and went back and forth searching sites, but I am beyond pleased with this mattress and would not hesitate to recommend this one. If you are thinking of a mattress, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: twinmom

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is firm even while it is soft. It was fully expanded in a little less than 24 hours. There is an ever so slight smell to the foam, but it is not that bad and goes away in a week or so. It is worth it to have a good night's sleep again. We got the 12" since the 10" was not in stock, and it is great. It added 4" to the height of our already high bed. We placed the mattress on our box springs on an old iron bed. The full-sized mattress is about 3" wider than our old one and maybe an inch longer. It works though. We are using queen sized sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Miller Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great. We didn't have any issues with the mattress expanding or "off-gassing". I have been sleeping on it for almost 3 months and have had no problem. Last week it sagged under my hips and back. We rotated it and now I'm sleeping in the part where it sagged under my husband. We contacted Amazon and they said contact Zinus. We contacted Zinus and they said we cannot return it because we purchased it through Amazon. They might replace it, though. I would rather have my money back. I don't want to be returning a mattress every 3 months for the next 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: R. Waack

customer_reviews.title: Very very firm mattress, 8 inch version anyway
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to description of ''cloud like'' comfort, I need a plush bed for pain relief, and I have it on a platform bed with wood slats, but for me this is just a couple notches above sleeping on the floor for me. It may be due to the 8 inch size, maybe in taller versions it is as comfortable as described. Many people seek out firm mattresses, and for them this would be good, but they should NOT be promoting as cloudlike comfort in this version.
customer_reviews.author: BGrace

customer_reviews.title: The whole experience unfortunately dragged down my rating
customer_reviews.text: mattress is good, came well packaged, the company you can tell cares about the product they offer. Foam mattress is too soft for my liking but it's a guest bed. For those coming in for a night or 2, it does the trick. If you like firm mattresses, it would not be a good match. Shipping is not reliable on this item. My product arrived later than prime guarantee delivery. Not pleased with that. If you need this for a deadline beware.
customer_reviews.author: Rick In STL

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted a good 1.5 years with more than two people sleeping on it regularly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after a previous and less satisfactory mattress purchase. Have had about 1.5 years so far and it is still a solid bed with no permanent indents. It is comfortable support for 1-3 average sized people. My partners and myself are under 170 lb so I don't know how it would hold up for heavier sleepers, but we are in a somewhat open relationship and for most of this beds life it has had 3 people sleeping in it. The only reason we are replacing it is that a queen size is a bit small for 3 people to toss and turn in over the course of a night , and we are keeping it for the guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dankovich

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Mama!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother who is 73. She was complaining of discomfort, aches and pains, because of her old mattress. I bought her this and she loves it. No more aches and pains. She said she sleeps so good. She needed something firm, but not so firm it hurts her. So, I purchased medium firm. She is a stomach sleeper, but wanted some give for comfort and to protect her aging body. It was a perfect pick! She couldn't be happier and that makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST MATTRESS I EVER OWNED, BUT....
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th one I bought. It's firm with a cloud like top, perfect and cheap! The one thing you must do is let the mattress sit for about a week after you open it. It spreads out and rises pretty quick, in a few hours, so I didn't follow the directions and began using the mattress right away in the past. This time I opened it up and, even though it looked like it was full height, I let it sit for about a week. What a difference in softness of the top compared to the other 3 which are flatter and harder on top.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived intact and was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Update: didn't need to wait 6 months- our 5 year old sleeps great. I'm a side sleeper- major lower back pain! I'm not a back pain person. Would not recommend for side sleeper- too firm Ordered a full mattress for our little girl. Package arrived intact and was easy to set up. I find the bed comfortable. A good mix between soft and firm. Very supportive. I'll update review in 6 months. The reason for four stars. One corner didn't inflate fully. About 80% to capacity. Visibly slumped. For our purposes it is acceptable, but if the bed were for two adults I would find it unappealing and perhaps bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible even for a cheap mattress
customer_reviews.text: Save your time and money. It’s cheap so I don’t expect much but this is laughable. 72 hours and it still looks terrible. At its thickets it’s 8 inches, at its thinnest it’s 6. The corners are deformed and not inflating. It’s bad, as you can see in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mendenwf

customer_reviews.title: You can stop looking because this is the mattress you've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I searched all over locally and online for a mattress. With my old mattress every morning when I woke up my hips and lower back hurt. Finally after much searching I decided to get this mattress. Since day one it has been AWESOME! I no longer wake up with those arches and pains. It's the most comfortable mattress I've ever owned. Every night when I lay down I'm so thankful I decided to get this mattress. The only very minor complaint I have is that it's very hot to sleep on. I just crank up the AC and keep on sleeping. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS MATTRESS!
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Back and Hips!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Several months in with this mattress. Absolutely the worst purchase I have ever made and I have made several bad picks. I hate going to bed -- no matter how tired I am. I have tried sleeping at the very edge of the mattress. The center of the mattress. Crosswise on the bed. Top of the bed. Bottom of the bed. There is not a comfortable place anywhere on this mattress. Too bad it came in a box and my husband refused to try and reroll it in order to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: removable "pillow top" cover fell apart the first time it was washed
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is reasonably comfy and does sleep somewhat cooler than a straight memory foam mattress. On the other hand, you really can not tell it is a memory foam mattress at all, there is no sensation of sinking in and having the support of a regular memory foam mattress. It really might as well not have the very thin memory foam layer. Still, it was an ok mattress, but as the title of my review says, the first time I washed the "pillow top" cover (the directions do say it can be washed--cold water/gentle cycle and dry on low heat) the backing all fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Firm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just received our mattress about a week ago and it’s been great, a huge improvement over our 6 yr old mattress that cost over 2k! I highly recommend it and have already purchased a queen size for our guest room and a full for my kids room as well. There was no odor I read about in others reviews in either of the two I have purchased and was happy to see they both fully inflated in about 36-48 hrs. Highly recommend for use ona. Platform bed
customer_reviews.author: SSLBCA

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye back pain
customer_reviews.text: It took me forever to decide on what mattress to buy before moving into my apartment. I went with this mattress and I’ll never regret it. It really is a cloud bed. It has enough firmness so you don’t sink in but enough plushness to feel like you’re laying on a cloud, if you want to know what that feels like, but this mattress. I suggest always buying a zippered mattress cover to protect the mattress, and keep it as clean as the day you bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Airbnb but put it I slept on it a few days first to test it. At the time I was recovering from pneumonia and having rib issues from all the coughing. At first it was very comfortable but I I'm a side sleeper and I normally sleep on a Sleep Number bed, and the foam mattress did not give enough so my ribs became even worse. Had I not already had the problems I had, I think it would have been okay, but I cannot sleep on it. I will update once I begin to get reviews from guests at my Airbnb on its comfort.
customer_reviews.author: K. Putz

customer_reviews.title: Be Patient! Let It Expand! Enjoy The Cloudy Heavens!
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Zinus 14 Inch SmartBase with this product and find the comfort differences large from a typical mattress. This is my first purchase in an exquisite and premium mattress of this price, and I have been very happy since my purchase back in May 2017. I wanted to float on a cloud, this happens to be the one for me. Do not forget to let this product expand for at least 3 days (72 hours) before you sleep on this product! The product comes rolled up and not as expanded until you wait the amount of time required, I waited extra than the 2 days (48 hours) while I was away from home.
customer_reviews.author: John Claudio

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress suuuckss! First of all, it's not 12 inches thick. It's more like 9. The sheets don't stay on it, every morning I have to put the sheets back over the corners, you sink into it because it's just WAY too soft. There's absolutely no support, it just squishes down almost completely when you sit or lay on it and it heats up and you wake up hot as heck and sweaty no matter what you do. It just retains sooooo much heat. I keep the A/C on and a fan on me through the night, and I avoid sleeping under the covers and still wake up sweating because of this mattress. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Mattress life is poor and they don't honor their warranty promise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 mattresses over the last 3 years from Zinus. 4 of the 5 have been great. One of them is defective and sags significantly. I sent pictures and everything they asked for in my claim for warranty and they told me they would not honor the warranty. The mattress wasn't expensive, but it is disappointing they won't honor their promise. I will buy another mattress...just never from Zinus again. As you can see from my photos, the mattress sags about 4 inches in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic bed!
customer_reviews.text: I had never bought a delivered bed before and always had a traditional box spring and coil mattress. I upgraded from an older queen to this. Placed it on two traditional twin XL box springs and slept on it that night. It came up to it's full height quickly and there was not issued with smell. My girlfriend loves it. I am a 280lb back sleeper and after many nights on this I can report it is comfortable and I'd buy it again. I got mine for $320 so watch the price for a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sam F.

customer_reviews.title: Nope!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really thought id love this bed but it gave me aches and pains I didn't have before. Not a good mattress for what I expected but hey it was out of a box so I should have known. I ended up giving it away. And had trouble doing so. Ya way over rated
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Still Great After 2.5 Years!
customer_reviews.text: I waited almost three years to write a review on this to give everyone a perspective on long-term use. This mattress is just as good as the first night I slept on it! I’m so glad I took a chance on this cheap option after a lot of debating. I saved a lot of time (and a buttload of money, I’m sure) by avoiding brick & mortar mattress shops that are overpriced. A buddy of mine bought a mattress from a store around the same time I did and spent probably four times as much... Couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cooper326

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous not to try it but it EXCEEDS expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have been in 2 very bad car accidents and have had a lot of back pain issues. I slept on a friend’s guest bed for several months and they had a Temperpedic. I was spoiled because during that time my back pain was way more manageable, but I knew I couldn’t afford that type of bed. I did some researching and ended up trying this one: I love it! My back feels great and I feel so well rested! When I leave town, my roommates take turns sleeping in my bed, because everyone knows it is the most comfortable. I recommend this so much especially for such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: danielle hardt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft but supportive bed
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I’ve had this bed for 4 or 5 months and am still in love with it. Extremely comfortable. Not too soft but definitely not considered firm. I have chronic migraines so I spend a lot of time in bed and I truly don’t mind laying in this bed all day. I would buy again if I needed another mattress. Just received this product. I absolutely love it. I was very nervous about ordering a mattress online but very pleasantly surprised. I was wanting a mattress that was soft but would still provide support and this one delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Lumbar issues? Back sleeper? STAY CLEAR!!
customer_reviews.text: Good if you want to use it for less than a year. Otherwise expect back pains in your lumbar +/- 1 year. Lucky (or unlucky) us, we were able to stick it out for 1.5 year. But the last 6 months were painful. We alternated it every way possible and the craters were still there so we decided to toss it. I’m a back sleeper and my husband is a side sleeper. Both of us started having craters/sag on our respective side, just like the rest have mentioned. If you have lower back pain, stay away from this bed. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Swt

customer_reviews.title: Pillow top adds an extra touch of comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! Plus, the 12" thickness on top of a 14" high Zinus frame makes for a comfortable bed that is easy to get in and out. The pillow top adds an extra level of comfort, which makes this mattress stand out when compared to the flat top memory foam mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.  Never decompressed. Waste of time & money!!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad experience. My king matress was defective and did not fully decompress. I purchased the elite 14" Zinus king heavy duty smart bases. The matress was so flimsy that when I sat on the edge I literally sat on the base. I've purchased 2 other twin 10" Lucid brand memory foam beds for my kids and they are great. Perhaps Zinus should stick to the bed hardware and not mattresses. I purchased based up the large number of reviews. However, Amazon customer support was amazing and handled the return perfect. I tried to call Zinus 3 times and never got ahold of them. Spend the extra money and get a Lucid or other top brand.
customer_reviews.author: KATriedIt727

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for my daughter on October 30, 2017. This mattress still has a terrible chemical smell (+5 months later) and I am concerned that this mattress is not safe for her to sleep on. I have bought several memory foam mattresses in the past and I understand that off gassing is common early in the mattresses life. It has been over 5 months now and the chemical smell is still very strong and I do not want my daughter sleeping on this mattress anymore. I contacted Zinus customer support directly and they would not provide me with an adequate solution. I would stay away from Zinus if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cooper

customer_reviews.title: and this mattress has been amazing! It's supportive and soft at the same time
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks, here's my review: I replaced my old 8 inch memory foam after 6 years with this mattress. I have moderate to severe back problems, and this mattress has been amazing! It's supportive and soft at the same time! I researched many products before deciding on this one, and I definitely recommend following the instructions (open on a flat surface, let floof for at least 24 hrs). There was definitely a smell, and since I added a breathable mattress cover the scent lingered lightly for almost 2 weeks, but it wasn't so bad it kept me from sleeping on the mattress. Worth it!!! ***will update in a few months***
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Feels like laying on clouds!
customer_reviews.text: So happy about this mattress! Hated spring mattresses and finally invested into this one and am pleased to have purchased this one! As for the other reviews, It did not smell like chemicals! I left it on the living room floor while in the plastic with one end open and within a few hours it inflated perfectly! So excited to finally have a great mattress!
customer_reviews.author: J Olive

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! I admit I was kind of scared about buying a mattress I couldn't try before purchase, but decided with the low price point if it didn't work out I could replace it in a few months. I am not a large or super strong woman, but I was quite capable of getting the mattress into my house and set up by myself. Within 2 hours of setting up, the mattress was at least 95% expanded. I did not notice any odor from the mattress. I have found this mattress to be the most comfortable and no longer wake up with hip and shoulder pain from sleeping on my side.
customer_reviews.author: C

product_meta.title: Zinus 12 Inch Cloud Memory Foam Mattress / Pressure Relieving / Plush Feel / Bed-in-a-Box / OEKO-TEX and CertiPUR-US Certified, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style Name:12 InchWe may never know what it’s like to sleep on a cloud, but with the Cloud Memory Foam Mattress we like to think we’re close! We designed it with a plush, quilted cover and a unique combination of foam layers that provide a plush, luxurious feel. This innovative system of layers shapes itself to your body to give you a pressure relieving, customized sleep experience like no other. Providing you with cleaner sleep, it’s specially infused with green tea and natural charcoal for freshness and resistance against odor-causing agents over time. And to top it off, the foam is Certi-PUR US certified and the cover is OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified, meaning it’s good for you and the environment. All of this goodness, along with a 10 year worry-free warranty, compressed into one convenient box and shipped right to your door. Thousands of highly satisfied customers agree, until science finds a way to put actual clouds in the bedroom, this mattress will do just fine. All sizes are subject to +/- 0.5
feature_bullets: Green Tea and Activcharcoal-infused Memory Foam With a Plush, Microfiber Quilted Jacquard Cover

CLOUDLIKE LUXURY - We’re not kidding - the feel of our Cloud mattress is just how we imagine it would feel to sleep on one; with cradling memory foam and plush microfiber, we’ve created a cloudlike, luxurious feel that hugs your curves like no other

SUPPORTIVE FOAMS - 2 total inches plush microfiber and foam quilted top, 2 inches conforming memory foam, 3 inches soft comfort foam, and 5 inches durable, high density base support foam; ideal for side sleepers and petite to average-weight sleepers

CERTIPUR US & OEKO TEX CERTIFIED - Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content; cover meets OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certification standards and has been manufactured under environmentally friendly conditions

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars11,342 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Green Tea and Activcharcoal-infused Memory Foam With a Plush, Microfiber Quilted Jacquard Cover
